How many emirates make up the federation.text: The federation’s seventh member, Fujairah (Al-Fujayrah), faces the Gulf of Oman and is the only member of the union with no frontage along the Persian Gulf. The states gained autonomy following World War II (1939–45), when the trucial states of Bahrain and Qatar declared independent statehood. The rest were formally united in 1971, with the city of Abu Dhabi serving as the capital. Dubai, United Arab Emirates Dubai, United Arab Emirates, as seen from the top of Burj Khalifa. (more)

They write new content and verify and edit content received from contributors.
